attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252552. Vehicle comes with a balance of a 3year unlimited KM Service and Warranty plan. The Mazda BT-50 is truly a double-cab that’s the complete package, bold, balanced, stylish and capable. Dare to be different than the norm. Stand out and turn heads with this workhorse, but with all the comfort of family bakkie. It comes with even more features like Apple Car Play, USB ports, Cruise Control, Key less access, keyless start/stop.
Apart from being much more handsomely styled than its predecessor, the new BT-50 offers appreciably more appeal for buyers who want the practicality and looks of a bakkie, but ultimately utilize their vehicles as family cars. 

We deliver country wide, inhouse financing available.
The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved.
T&Cs apply
